name: @vue-compiler-rs/wasm
description: Vue compiler implemented in Rust - WASM bindings

scripts.build: cargo build --release -p vue_bindings --no-default-features --features wasm --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && wasm-bindgen ../../target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/vue_bindings.wasm --out-dir . --target web
scripts.build:debug: cargo build -p vue_bindings --no-default-features --features wasm --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && wasm-bindgen ../../target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/debug/vue_bindings.wasm --out-dir . --target web
